    Static Public

    public extractNodeRecursively(node: Object, filterGroups: Array): Boolean source 

    import extractNodeRecursively from 'css-node-extract/js/lib/extract-node-recursively.js'

    Whiteliste a node if it (or one of the nodes parents) matches the given filter.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    node Object

    A postcss node object.
    filterGroups Array

    Array of filter groups.

    Return:

    Boolean

    Returns true if the node (or one of its parents) matches one or more filter groups and false if not.

    Test:

    • test/lib/extract-node-recursively.test.js

    public nodeMatchesFilter(node: Object, filter: Object): Boolean source 

    import nodeMatchesFilter from 'css-node-extract/js/lib/node-matches-filter.js'

    Check if a node matches the given filter.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    node Object

    A postcss node object.
    filter Object

    Filter object.

    Return:

    Boolean

    Returns true if the node matches the filter and false if not.

    Test:

    • test/lib/node-matches-filter.test.js

    public postcssNodeExtract(filterNames: Array | String, customFilter: Object): Function source 

    import postcssNodeExtract from 'css-node-extract/js/lib/postcss-node-extract.js'

    A PostCSS plugin for extracting nodes from CSS code.

    Params:

    NameTypeAttributeDescription
    filterNames Array | String

    Multiple filter names as array or a single filter name as string.
    customFilter Object

    Custom filter object.

    Return:

    Function

    PostCSS plugin.
